# HMCharacteristicValueTargetHeaterCoolerState.cool

**Case**

The accessory should operate as a cooler.

## Declaration

```swift
case cool
```

## Target State

- **HMCharacteristicValueTargetHeaterCoolerState.automatic**: The accessory should choose whether to heat or cool.
- **HMCharacteristicValueTargetHeaterCoolerState.heat**: The accessory should operate as a heater.

items.description: The accessory should choose whether to heat or cool.
